name: snac
description: snac2 is a minimalist self-hosted microblogging server implementing ActivityPub. It provides a lightweight interface for posting and federating with the Fediverse.
features: ActivityPub federation: Connects with Mastodon, Pleroma, and other Fediverse platforms.
Minimalist design: Provides lightweight microblogging with minimal resource usage.
Timeline feeds: Displays home, local, and federated timelines for content discovery.
Post creation: Publishes text posts with mentions, hashtags, and media attachments.
Following system: Follows users across the Fediverse with automatic updates.
Notifications: Alerts on mentions, follows, and interactions from other users.
Media uploads: Attaches images and files to posts with automatic processing.
No database: Stores all data in flat files for simplicity and portability.
Single-user focus: Optimized for personal instances rather than large communities.
RSS feeds: Generates RSS feeds for posts and timelines.
Custom CSS: Personalizes appearance with custom stylesheets.
Low maintenance: Requires minimal configuration and administration.
